description: Try our easy to follow Thai Watermelon & Prawn Fried Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fried rice,Pescatarian,Prawn,Gluten free,Egg free,Summer,Broccolini,Quick & easy dinner,Wheat free,Rice,Jan Feb 2020,Watermelon,Dairy free
name: Thai Watermelon & Prawn Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup Thai chilli jam stir-fry paste

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tbs oil in a wok or large frying pan over high heat. Stir-fry prawns for 1-2 minutes or until they just change in colour. Add 1 tbs chilli jam and stir-fry for 2 minutes or until prawns are just cooked through. Transfer to a bowl.
Heat remaining oil in a wok or pan over high heat. Add remaining chilli jam and broccolini, and stir-fry for 1 minute or until broccolini is bright green.
Add rice and stir-fry for 3 minutes or until heated through. Stir in fish sauce and juice of half a lime.
Divide rice among bowls. Top with prawns, watermelon and coriander. Scatter over nuts and serve with remaining lime cut into wedges.
